items.sentence: I haven't seen Tom for years, nor Mary for that matter.
We need to make good use of the money we've been given.
When do you think that Tom is going to want to do that?
I heard that Tom and Mary were planning to get married.
Do you think that you could get Tom to do that for you?
I think that we should tell Tom that he has to do that.
Do you think that Tom would like me to do that for him?
Tom will be very upset when he finds out what happened.
When are you going to tell Tom you want to get married?
Tom knew he couldn't do what Mary was asking him to do.
I'm sure that Tom won't like the wine that you brought.
Tom was acquitted on the grounds of temporary insanity.
Tom saw Mary sitting on her porch, and he waved at her.
By the time Tom got to the shop, it was already closed.
There's no speed limit on this stretch of the Autobahn.
I was on the basketball team when I was in high school.
I've already forgotten what my grandfather looked like.
The only reason Tom goes to the library is to see Mary.
Tom wants you to know he really didn't want to do that.
Some people write books for money, others for pleasure.
